io.netty.handler.codec.spdy

Class SpdyHttpDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelStateHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundMessageHandlerAdapter<I>
          • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageDecoder<SpdyDataOrControlFrame>
            • io.netty.handler.codec.spdy.SpdyHttpDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelHandlerUtil.SingleInboundMessageHandler<SpdyDataOrControlFrame>, ChannelInboundMessageHandler<SpdyDataOrControlFrame>, ChannelStateHandler

    public class SpdyHttpDecoder
extends MessageToMessageDecoder<SpdyDataOrControlFrame>
    Decodes SpdySynStreamFrames, SpdySynReplyFrames, and SpdyDataFrames into FullHttpRequests and FullHttpResponses.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpdyHttpDecoder

        public SpdyHttpDecoder(int version,
               int maxContentLength)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        version - the protocol version
        maxContentLength - the maximum length of the message content. If the length of the message content exceeds this value, a TooLongFrameException will be raised.

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        protected Object decode(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
            SpdyDataOrControlFrame msg)
                 throws Exception
        Description copied from class: MessageToMessageDecoder
        Decode from one message to an other. This method will be called till either the MessageBuf has nothing left or till this method returns null.
        Specified by:
        decode in class MessageToMessageDecoder<SpdyDataOrControlFrame>
        Parameters:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext which this MessageToMessageDecoder belongs to
        msg - the message to decode to an other one
        Returns:
        message the decoded message or null if more messages are needed be cause the implementation needs to do some kind of aggragation
        Throws:
        Exception - is thrown if an error accour
